name: Beach Boys Volleyball
description:
Controls:

Player 1: WD to move left and right and W to jump

Player 2: LEFT AND RIGHT ARROWS to move left and right and UP ARROW to jump

FIRST TO 6 WINS!

Description:

Listen to a beautiful rendition of Beach Boy's "Surfer Girl" as you and another player bounce around a volleyball on the beach. 

Developed in a week for a music themed game jam. 

Credits:

Art/Programming: Charlie Hattabaugh, Connor Kilpatrick, and Sean Park

Music: Charlie Hattabaugh
